sentence: Avon Products, Inc. ( AVP ) will begin trading ex-dividend on May 12, 2015.
A cash dividend payment of $0.06 per share is scheduled to be paid on June 01, 2015.
Shareholders who purchased AVP prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 11th quarter that AVP has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $7.21, the dividend yield is 3.33%.
The previous trading day's last sale of AVP was $7.21, representing a -52.25% decrease from the 52 week high of $15.10 and a 3.89% increase over the 52 week low of $6.94.
AVP is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
AVP's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is -$.83.
Zacks Investment Research reports AVP's forecasted earnings growth in 2015 as -54.81%, compared to an industry average of -12.7%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the AVP Dividend History page.
